us.title: About us
us.description: Are you tired of the daily monotony, where this jungle of asphalt adsorbs you every day? We have the solution for a few days of rest and learning, reconnecting with yourself in Guatape. There is much to discover here in Colombia, in an environment of harmony of nature. I propose you rural tours where we will visit fantastic places enjoying the flora and fauna of the region.
